title: Welcome to Little Luxuries
description: Thanks for checking us out. I'm exicited to share my love for Los Angeles with you. I hope you find this site helpful and informative, and that it inspires you to explore all that Los Angeles has to offer. On this website, you'll discover items from our local gift shop that is built with love and care. We offer a variety of products that are tailored to both locals and tourists. I hope you enjoy your visit to Little Luxuries, and that you find something special to take home with you.
